system.descriptor: Moving Quietly, concealing themselves or an object from a searcher, Shadowing someone, etc.
system.uses:
From Prior Editions: Includes Concealment, Silent Move, and Shadowing
Uses: Opposed Test vs a foe's Awareness. Used for: Scouting an Enemy Force without being detected, sneaking up on a foe to kill them, following someone without arousing suspicion.
Special Use: Shadowing: Stealth vs Target's Awareness. Can be anything from following a person whilst hiding in a crowd to following a starship with yours hiding in an asteroid field.
system.useTime: Free Action as part of Movement
